summary.span: 用于描述三维对象的大小的数据结构。

span.span: Data structure that describes the size of a three-dimensional object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 通常不在 XAML 中使用，因为在使用这些类型的 WPF 3d 对象模型中不存在可设置的属性。 and are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用静态方法来确定两个 结构是否 相等 。This example shows how to determine if two structures are equal using the static method. 下面的代码演示如何检查 结构是否相等。The following code illustrates how to check structures for equality. 已声明结构并为其赋值。The structures are declared and assigned values. 然后，使用方法来确定两个结构是否相等。The method is then used to determine if the two structures are equal. [!code-csharp[3DGallery_procedural_snip#Size3DEqualityExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/3DGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/Misc3DOperationsExample.cs#size3dequalityexample_csharp)]
